channel.title: How do i make a ::master command on a PI ? please help
channel.description: I NEED to know how to make a ::master command im not good with stuff like that tysm for your help ;)

item.title: How do i make a ::master command on a PI ? please help
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

put this in your commands.java

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a ::master command on a PI ? please help
